Description:
Detects a DNS query by a non browser process on the system to "azurewebsites.net". The latter was often used by threat actors as a malware hosting and exfiltration site.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To AzureWebsites.NET By Non-Browser Process
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" query_name="*azurewebsites.net" NOT (((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\SlimBrowser\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SlimBrowser\\*") process_path="*\\slimbrowser.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Vivaldi\\*" process_path="*\\vivaldi.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\midori-ng\\*" process_path="*\\Midori Next Generation.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Naver\\Naver Whale\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Naver\\Naver Whale\\*") process_path="*\\whale.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe") OR process_path="*\\safari.exe" OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\SeaMonkey\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SeaMonkey\\*") process_path="*\\seamonkey.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Opera\\*" process_path="*\\opera.exe") OR process_path="*\\Tor Browser\\*" OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Phoebe\\*" process_path="*\\Phoebe.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Avant Browser\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Avant Browser\\*") process_path="*\\avant.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*" process_path="*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe" (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe")) OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") (process_path="*\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="*\\msedgewebview2.exe")) OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Maxthon\\*" process_path="*\\maxthon.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Waterfox\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Waterfox\\*") process_path="*\\Waterfox.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Flock\\*" process_path="*\\Flock.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Falkon\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Falkon\\*") process_path="*\\falkon.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe") OR (process_path="*\\MsMpEng.exe" OR process_path="*\\MsSense.exe") OR (process_path="*\\brave.exe" process_path="C:\\Program Files\\BraveSoftware\\*"))
